spoilers.title: Warranty
spoilers.content: Once the project is completed, I commit to fixing the mistakes made(by me) during development within 1 week.

spoilers.title: Payment
spoilers.content: I work on a prepayment of 30% of the order amount.

spoilers.title: Getting Started
spoilers.content: Once all project details have been taken care of and prepayment has been received.

spoilers.title: Quality
spoilers.content:
The best!

I try to test each work thoroughly.

Your site will be valid, responsive, accessible, cross-browser and semantic.

spoilers.title: Edits
spoilers.content:
If edits, revisions or improvements were not specified in the TR, in this case, there will be a separate payment for each.

If the mistakes were made by me, then the edits are free.

spoilers.title: Consultation
spoilers.content: I give tips for improvement on UX.

spoilers.title: Browsers
spoilers.content: I don't support older browsers, as well as IE.
